name: Lds Church Book Of Mormon Cards Matching Games
name_original: Lds Church Book Of Mormon Cards Matching Games
description:
LDS memory game is very cute and funny game with many different Christ's pictures, which your child will definitely love! this game is the best way for your children to improve their concentration and memory. with 9 levels of difficulty the complexity of the game can be select.

Test your memory! simply flip the cards to reveal a matching pair.

How to play:

Initially you will see all cards turned face down. tap on one of the card and remember the picture on it. With the next tap try to find and flip the card with the same picture as previous one. If the pictures on the both cards will be the same they will stay opened and you can continue with the next pair. otherwise both cards will flip back over and you will get another try.
